TopicTitle: flying in my turbo jet to the north pole

Articles.Content:
well this was a project i started on a few hours ago but the problem is i now dont have enough fuel to touch the white snow ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) i landed aprox 30 miles away from the north pole on kerbin but the shear speed at the end there nearly ripped the landing gear off O\_0

![a5ef3e2c0173dea3f8f38a85744dac6d.png](https://i.gyazo.com/a5ef3e2c0173dea3f8f38a85744dac6d.png)

ATMOSPHERE BUG /\

![506c3e071cd259c41a5e708b9db2a876.png](https://i.gyazo.com/506c3e071cd259c41a5e708b9db2a876.png)

![2691a60eb38db612ed07e6d5f70a944b.png](https://i.gyazo.com/2691a60eb38db612ed07e6d5f70a944b.png)

![955edbc60e9883620f2d4ea4f4982a4d.png](https://i.gyazo.com/955edbc60e9883620f2d4ea4f4982a4d.png)

anyway enjoy the pics and post what you think on this design and how i could refine it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
